sentences.en: American's unilateralism act in fighting terrorism and its expansion tendency dissatisfy American's allied countries.
sentences.cn: 第三，美国反恐中的“单边主义”行为和扩大化倾向令盟国极为不满。

sentences.en: Are your dissatisfy actions related to the content of your work your company culture or the people with whom you work?
sentences.cn: 你不满意的是你工作的内容，公司文化，还是公司同事呢？

sentences.en: Envy may dissatisfy us with our lot.
sentences.cn: 嫉妒可使我们对自己的命运不满意.

sentences.en: It is our belief to further expand markets and dissatisfy with existing achievements.
sentences.cn: 进一步开拓市场，不满足于现有成绩是我们的信念。

sentences.en: More or other, they still dissatisfy.
sentences.cn: 更多或另外一些，它们仍然不满足。

sentences.en: You have the ability to either satisfy or dissatisfy them when you contact them.
sentences.cn: 在与顾客接触的时候，你就具有使顾客满意或者不满意的能力。

words.tran_cn: 不满意的；不高兴的；流露不满的
使不满（dissatisfy的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 使不满意，使不满足，使失望
